Topic: Illustrate plants with and without water and light.
Level Description: Proficient (shows most elements clearly and correctly)
CAN: Illustrate a plant with plenty of water and light, showing it healthy and growing.
Illustrate a plant without water, showing it wilted or not growing well.
Illustrate a plant without light, showing it not growing well or turning yellow.
Illustrate the different results of plants with and without water, indicating the need for water to survive.
Illustrate the different results of plants with and without light, indicating the need for light to survive.
Identify and label the elements of their drawings to show the presence or absence of water and light, but may occasionally miss a label.
CANNOT: Consistently and precisely label every element involved in each scenario, occasionally missing some small details (e.g., a plant part not labeled).
Accurately show minor variations like plant coloration for stress signs (e.g., not all leaves may show yellowing in the plant without light).
